channel.title: How to run my client?
channel.description:
when i try to run my source or client i get this error... i try to run it from terminal under ubuntu 10.4
[code] # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # SIGSEGV (0xb) at pc=0x010ecb8a, pid=11769, tid=1956641648 # # JRE version: 6.0_18-b18 # Java VM: OpenJDK Server VM (16.0-b13 mixed mode linux-x86 ) # Derivative: IcedTea6 1.8 # Distribution: Ubuntu 10.04.1 LTS, package 6b18-1.8-4ubuntu3 # Problematic frame: # V [libjvm.so+0x10ab8a] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # /home/knuteirik/rsps/onescape/client/hs_err_pid11769.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please include # instructions how to reproduce the bug and visit: # https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/openjdk-6/ # Aborted [/code]
please help me getting rid of this... the error is closing my client

item.title: How to run my client?
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

when i try to run my source or client i get this error…
i try to run it from terminal under ubuntu 10.4

# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  SIGSEGV (0xb) at pc=0x010ecb8a, pid=11769, tid=1956641648
#
# JRE version: 6.0_18-b18
# Java VM: OpenJDK Server VM (16.0-b13 mixed mode linux-x86 )
# Derivative: IcedTea6 1.8
# Distribution: Ubuntu 10.04.1 LTS, package 6b18-1.8-4ubuntu3
# Problematic frame:
# V  [libjvm.so+0x10ab8a]
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# /home/knuteirik/rsps/onescape/client/hs_err_pid11769.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please include
# instructions how to reproduce the bug and visit:
#   https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/openjdk-6/
#
Aborted

please help me getting rid of this… the error is closing my client
